overview: Vilnei Collares, a shattered filmmaker, tried to survive by producing films without a budget in his hometown, with little support from local merchants. As he struggles to save his marriage, stay out of jail and win an award at the Tupanciretã film festival, Vilnei prepares to produce his controversial dramatic feature “Filhotinho de Bukowski”, in the hope of not having to get involved in local politics .
title: O Cara Que Não Aglomerava
